name: Mika & Ozzie & Mitsu
description:
Help two witch apprentices to find new potion ingredients and maybe discover a new friend?

A little point and click game developed for the Wholesome Game Jam 2022

Credits: 

Code: Jennifer Edwards
Art: Anni Runge
Music:
Spooky Enchantment by Eric Matyas
Stage 1 Level 24 by Monsplaisir
